tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Concern doctor  is very friendly and job oriented person. My satisfaction level is very high as per my treatment is concerned. 
Thanks
Rita Chatterjee 
Koramangala
Bangalore

I got my denture done by Dr. Shreya in Apollo dental hsr 27th main, and i was very happy and satisfied with my procedure. Doctor is having lot of patience and she follow up after every visit. Overall treatment charges and experience was worth .. thanks to her team!!

I visited Apollo dental clinic in HSR 27th main with severe tooth sensitivity problem, Dr. Shreya attended me and I was suggested for some root canals and crowning of few teeth.. I was really satisfied with my entire treatment
Did my teeth whitening procedure in Apollo dental 27th branch, clinic is very good and hygienic.  Entire team is well experienced and I m having with my overall experience

Excellent service! The dental clinic provided top-notch care for my root canal treatment and crown placement. The staff was friendly, knowledgeable, and made me feel comfortable throughout the process. The dentist was skilled and explained everything clearly. I would like to say thanks to Dr. Shreya and her team and I highly recommend this clinic for anyone needing dental work.

My experience with the dental professionals at Apollo Dental Clinic HSR 27th main  was exceptional. The dentist I saw was knowledgeable, thorough, and genuinely cared about my oral health. They took the time to explain each procedure to me and answered all of my questions with patience and clarity. I felt like I was in good hands throughout my entire visit….Dr. Shreya is well experienced

Dr.Shreya is very polite and patiently clears all the doubts, recently I went for my tooth capping, and she explained and clears all my doubts regarding the materials to choose for my tooth.  I will recommend her. Pls visit her as she is genuine to her work!!

Awesome experience  very nice doctors and always recommended 
Please do visit the clinic  for any concerns

Recently visited Apollo dental hsr 27th Main branch for wisdom tooth extraction and I had a very good experience. Clinic environment is very positive with friendly doctors. Dr. Shreya explained me the treatment procedure very well and cleared all my doubts. Treatment cost is highly worth. Really happy with my visit.

I was treated for RCT last month  by dr shreya. Initially it was very dficult for me to decide any good clinic for dental . Some how with reference of my friend i visites HSR  layout clinic and it was very good experience overall. Thanks to dr shreya.
